name: Berial
description: An Assassin who excels at dodging damage by hiding in shadow and dealing damage to isolated targets.

ultimate.name: Scared Swamp
ultimate.description: Berial flies beneath the enemy, hiding within their shadow and dealing 36% damage every 0.25s, absorbing 15 Energy, lasting up to 5s. Berial is Invincible during the effect. Then he jumps out from the shadow, dealing 320% damage to adjacent enemies and frightening them for 4s.

upgrades.upgrade: Deals 38% damage to enemies every 0.25s when hiding in the shadow.
Deals 40% damage to enemies every 0.25s when hiding in the shadow.
Deals 42% damage to enemies every 0.25s when hiding in the shadow..
Deals 45% damage to enemies every 0.25s when hiding in the shadow.

skill_1.name: Shadow Trick
skill_1.description: Berial hides within the shadow, and becomes Invincible while hidden. If there are isolated enemies on the battlefield, Berial will move to each isolated target in turn, dealing 300% damage to each target. Otherwise, he will stay in the shadow, recover a total of 300% HP before returning to his original tile.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases the damage dealt to the isolated targets to 310%.
Increases the damage dealt to the isolated targets to 320%.
Increases the damage dealt to the isolated targets to 350%.

skill_2.name: Devil's Contract
skill_2.description: Berial hides within the shadow for 10s after being defeated. However, during which, if a non-summoned enemy is taken down, Berial will revive from the vanquished enemy and return to the battlefield with 40% of his max HP. This effect can only be triggered once per battle.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases Berial's restored HP to 45% of his max HP after revival.
Increases Berial's restored HP to 50% of his max HP after revival.
Increases Berial's restored HP to 60% of his max HP after revival.

hero_focus.name: Hero Focus
hero_focus.description: Berial reduces the damage dealt by an isolated enemy by 6% and increases their damage taken by 3%.

upgrades.upgrade: Berial reduces the damage dealt by an isolated enemy by 8% and increases their damage taken by 4%.
Berial reduces the damage dealt by an isolated enemy by 10% and increases their damage taken by 5%.

ex_skill.name: Shadow Reflection
ex_skill.description: If non-summoned enemies remain isolated for over 3s, they lose 180 Energy and generate a Silhouette that inherits 50% of Berial's ATK, HP and 100% of other stats. This Silhouette loses 8% of its max HP per second. This effect can only be triggered once on the same target within 20s, and the Silhouette can only deal damage by normal attacks.

upgrades.upgrade: The Silhouette inherits 70% of Berial's ATK and HP.
Enemies lose 40 Energy when they receive damage from the Silhouette.
The Silhouette inherits 80% of Berial's ATK and HP.

enhance_force.name: Enhance Force
enhance_force.description: Increases the hiding duration after being defeated by 10s.

season_skill.name: Combo
season_skill.description: After casting the Ultimate, deals 125% damage to the current target with each of the next 4 skill casts or normal attacks.

upgrades.upgrade: Increases the skill damage dealt to 130%.
Increases the skill damage dealt to 135%.
Increases the skill damage dealt to 140%.
Increases the skill damage dealt to 145%.
Increases the skill damage dealt to 150%.
Increases the skill damage dealt to 155%.
Increases the skill damage dealt to 160%.
